definition: foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks
position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential

sentences.english: In the center-off state, the pin bit follows the port bit.
sentences.chinese: 在中心關閉狀態，管腳位服從端口位。

sentences.english: A. Recommend set pins to input mode when you use ADC function.
sentences.chinese: 建議在使用ADC時將腳位設爲輸入模式。
